p: It is known that ergosterol peroxide isolated from edible or medicinal mushrooms demonstrates antitumor activity against colorectal cancer, hepatocellular carcinoma, prostate cancer, myeloma, and leukemia [ 119, 120, 121, 122, 123], and it also possesses antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antiviral activities, as well as induce the apoptosis of cancer cells [ 124, 125, 126, 127, 128].
